Package de.ibm.com.opentm2scripteride.gui

Class Summary
AboutWindow About Window of the openTM2ScripterIDE
ColorSelection ColorSelection is a Panel with a JColorChooser to change diverse highlighting colors of the editor.
ConfigDialog Configuration Dialog where general settings and settings for the editor can be set.
FontSelector Panel with a Font selector for font changes of the general font of the editor
HelpDialog The Help Dialog, with help content for users.
Highlighting Highlighting class is responsible for syntax changes (bold/italic) for the diverse highlightingtypes of the editor.
MainWindow The main window of the openTM2Scripter IDE
ReportingSystemPanel  
RunTestSuitePanel  
ScripterOptions  
WindowConnector Responsible for the execution of all actions which will be performed after an event in the main class occured
